oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Overton Park - Aerial View
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Overton Park -- 335-acre wooded park in the center of Memphis, Tennessee. Here are located the Memphis Zoo, featuring a free children's circus daily (except Monday) during the summer months; Brooks Memorial Art Gallery; a 9-hole golf course; playground area; and picnic grounds."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Overton Park; aerial photography;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Michael Crawford; Digitized by S. Frierson
